column5: Use to use a 1/16 oz Gypsy King spoon for stream trout fishing. They are out of business now and would like to find some or get a recommendation of a small spoon that people like.
I HAVE A SMALL DOUBLE SPOON THAT YOU MAYBE INTERESTED IN.MY WEB SITE IS tunespoons.comIt geat for the fish your fishing for tuna
I had great success last season on rainbows with the Northland Fire-eye Minnow in Glow Rainbow.T.J.
